--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Darkfate:
> 
> DarkFate quickly trasformer in his dragon-beast form and took off 
> spatting energy balls towards quickstrie
> 
> 
Quickstrike tried to avoid the attack but still took a few hits
knocking him on his back. 
"Wha'd is that thing?" He asked himself. Desperate he fired another
venom blast from his snake-mouth.  Though if it didn't work he feared
that he would be a sitting duck to further fire from the dragon.
